translation: Yogis, having abandoned attachment, perform actions only through the body, mind, intellect, and even the senses, for the purification of the self.
commentary: 5.11 Kayen by the body? Manasa by the mind? Buddhya by the intellect? Kevalaih only? Indriyaih by the senses? Even also? Yogis: Yogis? Karma action? do perform? Sangam attachment? Leaving having abandoned? Atmashuddhaye for the purification of the self. Commentary Yogis here means Karma Yogis who are devoted to the path of action? who are free from egoism and selfishness? who work for the purification
